questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image of the equipment
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
check and confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment
prepare the Incident / Damage and Missing Report
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230
shift the equipment to another place where AC Voltage of 230 is provided
check the continuity of power cord and confirm whether it is defective
replace the power cord with a new one
check the continuity of AC fuse and confirm whether the fuse is blown out
replace the AC Fuse with a new one
open the equipment as shown in the video, check whether input AC Voltage of 230 is available to power supply board.

videos.videoName: Video for checking I/P AC Volt

questions.question: check and confirm is there any loose connection/breakage of cable from Power Input Module to Power supply board.
reseat/replace the cables properly
check and confirm for any breakage / carbon formation of Power Input Module.
replace the Power Input Module with a new one

videos.videoName: Video for replacing Power Input Module

questions.question: check and confirm whether Output Voltage is available at the power supply board
repair / replace the power supply board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing power supply board

questions.question: check and confirm whether there is any loose connection / breakage of cable from power supply to control board.
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
repair / replace the control board accordingly
check and confirm whether the ml of syringe is detected.
open the equipment as shown in the video, change the sensor
check and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON, but the display is plan / blank
open the equipment as shown in the video, check and confirm whether there is any loose connection / breakage of cable from control board to display.
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
repair / replace the display accordingly
check and confirm whether some of the buttons or buttons do not respond while pressing.
check and confirm whether there is any loose connection / breakage of cable from keypad to control board
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
repair / replace the keypad assemble accordingly and confirm whether the problem still persist.
repair / replace the control board accordingly
check and confirm whether the syringe spindle is moving freely
open the equipment as shown in the video, check and confirm for any obstruction / dust in the drive.
clean the obstruction
check and confirm whether there is any obstruction / breakage of gears.
clean / replace the gears accordingly
check and confirm whether the motor is not functional.
replace the motor with a new one
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the technical team for any other assistance through video call.
Thanks
